original_text: Yes, their mother has lived as a prostitute. She became pregnant because she had sex with other men instead of with her husband. She should be ashamed. She herself said, ‘I will go and sleep with my lovers. They give me food and water. They give me wool, linen, olive oil and wine.’
korean_text: 그들의 어머니는 음행하였고 그들을 임신했던 자는 부끄러운 일을 행하였나니 이는 그가 이르기를 나는 나를 사랑하는 자들을 따르리니 그들이 내 떡과 내 물과 내 양털과 내 삼과 내 기름과 내 술들을 내게 준다 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Yes, their mother has lived as a prostitute
She became pregnant because she had sex with other men
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 다른 남자들과 성관계를 해서 임신했습니다

sentences.original_text: I will go and sleep with my lovers
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 연인들과 함께 자러 가겠다

sentences.original_text: They give me food and water
They give me wool, linen, olive oil and wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나에게 양모, 아마, 올리브유와 포도주를 준다
